text: main ( ) { int tc ; scanf ( "%d" , & tc ) ; while ( tc -- ) { int i , j , n , c = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int ar [ n ] [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & ar [ i ] [ j ] ) ; c = ar [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; int k = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( i + 1 <= n - 1 && k + 1 <= i + 1 ) { if ( ( c + ar [ i + 1 ] [ k ] ) > ( c + ar [ i + 1 ] [ k + 1 ] ) ) { c = c + ar [ i + 1 ] [ k ] ; } else { if ( ( c + ar [ i + 1 ] [ k + 1 ] ) > ( c + ar [ i + 1 ] [ k - 1 ] ) ) { c = c + ar [ i + 1 ] [ k + 1 ] ; k = k + 1 ; } else { c = c + ar [ i + 1 ] [ k - 1 ] ; } } } } printf ( "%d\n" , c ) ; } return 0 ; }

while ( tc -- ) { int i , j , n , c = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int ar [ n ] [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & ar [ i ] [ j ] ) ; c = ar [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; int k = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( i + 1 <= n - 1 && k + 1 <= i + 1 ) { if ( ( c + ar [ i + 1 ] [ k ] ) > ( c + ar [ i + 1 ] [ k + 1 ] ) ) { c = c + ar [ i + 1 ] [ k ] ; } else { if ( ( c + ar [ i + 1 ] [ k + 1 ] ) > ( c + ar [ i + 1 ] [ k - 1 ] ) ) { c = c + ar [ i + 1 ] [ k + 1 ] ; k = k + 1 ; } else { c = c + ar [ i + 1 ] [ k - 1 ] ; } } } } printf ( "%d\n" , c ) ; }
